trans-unit.source: It's considered a good practice to have only test classes marked public in a test project.
trans-unit.target: It's considered a good practice to have only test classes marked public in a test project.

trans-unit.source: Public type '{0}' should be marked with '[TestClass]' or changed to 'internal'
trans-unit.target: Public type '{0}' should be marked with '[TestClass]' or changed to 'internal'

trans-unit.source: Public types should be test classes
trans-unit.target: Public types should be test classes

trans-unit.source: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should not be 'static'

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should be 'public'
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should be 'public'

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should be 'public' or 'internal'
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should be 'public' or 'internal'

trans-unit.source: Test classes should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test classes should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: TestContext property should follow the following layout to be valid: - it should be a property - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be readonly.
trans-unit.target: TestContext property should follow the following layout to be valid: - it should be a property - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be readonly.

trans-unit.source: Member 'TestContext' should be a property and not a field
trans-unit.target: Member 'TestContext' should be a property and not a field

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be settable
trans-unit.target: Property 'TestContext' should be settable

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: Property 'TestContext' should not be 'static'

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public'
trans-unit.target: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public'

trans-unit.source: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public' or 'internal'
trans-unit.target: Property 'TestContext' should be 'public' or 'internal'

trans-unit.source: Test context property should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test context property should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should not be 'async void' - it should be a special method (finalizer, operator...).
trans-unit.target: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' (or 'internal' if '[assembly: DiscoverInternals]' attribute is set) - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should not be 'async void' - it should be a special method (finalizer, operator...).

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'abstract'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be 'abstract'

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'async void'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be 'async void'

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be 'static'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be 'static'

trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method

trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should be 'public'

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should be 'public' or 'internal'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should be 'public' or 'internal'

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should return 'void' or 'Task'
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should return 'void' or 'Task'

trans-unit.source: Test methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test methods should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: By default, MSTest runs tests within the same assembly sequentially, which can lead to severe performance limitations. It is recommended to enable assembly attribute '[Parallelize]' to run tests in parallel, or if the assembly is known to not be parallelizable, to use explicitly the assembly level attribute '[DoNotParallelize]'.
trans-unit.target: By default, MSTest runs tests within the same assembly sequentially, which can lead to severe performance limitations. It is recommended to enable assembly attribute '[Parallelize]' to run tests in parallel, or if the assembly is known to not be parallelizable, to use explicitly the assembly level attribute '[DoNotParallelize]'.

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 明確啟用或停用測試平行處理

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 明確啟用或停用測試平行處理
